message.entry: The parameter "{0}" does not exist for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" objects.
The "InteractiveSelection" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be a boolean.
The "FilterVisible" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be a boolean.
The "AutoSelect" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be a boolean.
The "TreeMultipleSelection" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be a boolean.
The "BusSupport" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be either ''none'',''wholeonly'',''elementonly'' or ''all''.
The "MdlrefSupport" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be either ''none'',''normalonly'' or ''all''.
The "SfSupport" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be a boolean.
The "RootName" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be a character vector.
The "ViewType" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be ''DDG''.
The "Model" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be the name of a Simulink model as a character vector.
The "HideBusRoot" parameter for "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object is expected to be a boolean.
当前选择的信号
Selected signal viewer tool component object should be constructed with an input of "Simulink.sigselector.Options" object.
The "CurrentSignals" field for the selected signal viewer tool component object should be a cell array that consist of "Simulink.sigselector.SignalItem" or "Simulink.sigselector.BusItem" objects.
The "FilterText" field for the selected signal viewer tool component object should be a character vector.
The "RegularExpression" field for the selected signal viewer tool component object should be a boolean.
The "FlatListEnabled" field for the selected signal viewer tool component object should be a boolean.
The "Items" field for the selected signal viewer tool component object should have a single item when the option "HideBusRoot" is true.
All the "BusItem" objects in the "Items" field for the selected signal viewer tool component object should be have a non-empty "Name" when the option "HideBusRoot" is false.
"Item" 的 "Name" 字段应为字符向量。
"Item" 的 "Source" 字段应为空或结构体。
"SignalItem" 的 "Selected" 字段应为布尔值。
"BusItem" 的 "Hierachy" 字段应为空或结构体。
信号层次结构错误
信号层次结构查看器尝试解析您点击的信号的总线层次结构；\n但是，它无法成功获取此信息，因为 ''Mux 模块用于创建总线信号'' 诊断未设置为 "错误"。\n要设置此项，请运行命令 "set_param(mdl,'StrictBusMsg','ErrorLevel1')"。
When the "InteractiveSelection" parameter is set to be true, the "Model" parameter is expected to be the name of a currently loaded Simulink model.

When the "InteractiveSelection" parameter is set to be true and BusSupport has any value other than "wholeonly", the signal viewer has to be able to sense bus signals. To be able to do so, it is required that the model has "StrictBusMsg" parameter to be "ErrorLevel1".
